price: Barang siapa yang mengerjakan dosa, maka sesungguhnya ia mengerjakannya untuk (kemudaratan) dirinya sendiri. Dan Allah Maha Mengetahui lagi Maha Bijaksana.
arabic: وَمَن يَكۡسِبۡ إِثۡمٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَكۡسِبُهُۥ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yaksib ith'man fa-innamā yaksibuhu ʿalā nafsihi wakāna al-lahu ʿalīman ḥakīman
